p09_merge_outputfile¶

Phenotyping.p09_merge_outputfile(inmd_dir: str, out_dir: str, eid: str, pid: str, out_prefix: str)¶

This function is used to merge all files stored in batch and output a single csv file to the destination folder.

Parameters

  • inmd_dir – intermediate directory location

  • out_dir (str) – output directory location

  • eid (str) – encounter id column name, initial value = ‘merged_enc_id’

  • pid (str) – patient id column name

Returns

Return type

None

Previous topic

p08_get_dischg_position
